title: Elder Wood Cassiopeia

embed.description: I Love the elderwood skinline and Cass so I Decided to make my own, here it is Cassiopeia from League of legends, Riot Games. Digital painting Elderwood Cassiopeia

body:
I am a bigggg fan of the Eldwerood skins, clearly, so I made cass one. :D
I imagine her tail to just be a wooden vessel for her posion as you can see. The roots of the trees kind of grow in her and supply her with the posion.

Her Q would be like zyras tiny plant seeds but when cast a poisonous flower grows and instantly explodes in a poisonous cloud, did i mention poison.
Her miasma(W) would just be green with little shrooms around it , lastly her twing Fangs (E) are just two wooden claws enhanced with poison.
It would be cool if when she ulted the enemy champs turned into wood but i would imagine that would take a lot of work lol

Last though; are Cass's posions really poison wouldn't it be venom?

HAPPY TO HEAR YOUR THOUGHTS

PS. Sorry for the elder wood spam :P

replies.body: Cass is in desperate need of good quality skins. This would satisfy me greatly.

if you play cass and want a skin for her Jade fang is great the snakes on her head move the metallic glow to her Ult W and Q are great sadly her E is a little lacking 
Mythic is good and the ult is by far the best thing about the skin her other skins are kind of lame
Nice skin. She definitely needs one.
I thought of that but I thought wouldn't make sense if cass spit roots out of her mouth
trueeeeeeee good idea
http://i.imgur.com/mZTuPFU.gif
My first pick for the next Elderwood skin would be Lulu but I like this Cass.
yeah I did that one too XD idk if you've seen it :P
I haven't! link plx
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/fqHFg7xj-lulu-skin-conept-elderwood
I love it. Love the flower hat and the fawn is so cute
haha glad you like it! :D
Ahhh amazing! I'm begging for a Cass skin. Gnar can get 3 in 11 months and Cass can't get one in 3 years. Makes me very sad.
Picture her ult tangling people in vines instead of stone
This is amazing. I was just talking about elder wood casa a couple days ago. I love it and she needs a skin.. This or something icy.

The idea and artwork is rlly great man!! I would rlly love rito for doing this skin and just for 750rp xd
 But for content with 1820rp skin ;D
lol 7months late but thanks a lot!

ANY skin for {{champion:69}} would be highly appreciated. She hasn't gotten a skin since early 2013 man ... but as for the OP, the Elder Wood skin looks really cool. It does bother me how fan made creations tend to look much better than what Riot produces half the time XD.

Don't get me wrong, Riot came out with some freaken good skins but the majority are alright in comparison with what the community has made.

Pretty cool, have an upvote.

But to be honest, I also like [this one](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/fqHFg7xj-lulu-skin-conept-elderwood).
thank you! :D
OMG yes!!!!! I love this idea
Custom skin it pls, or request it on mapskins.com huehuehue, some people there make good shit like this
this pic makes her look more like a earthworm with roots for hair than a half tree half snake woman
